{{Terminology Infobox
|title        = Fishing Points
|image        = Tutorial System Fishing 1.png
|type         = Game Systems
}}<section begin="intro"/>'''Fishing Points''' are locations where [[fishing]] is possible. They are available in each region. The player will not be able to fish if they are currently in combat.<section end="intro"/>
*Registered fishing points are fishing points registered with a fishing association. These contain an assortment of common fish. They can be found across Teyvat.
*Unregistered fishing points are fishing points that are more out in the wild. These are often protected by enemies or are located under harsh/sacred grounds. These can contain more exotic and rare fish.
Depending on the time of day, different fish will spawn:
*'''Night:''' The fish will only spawn between the hours of '''18:00 – 06:00''', based on in-game time.
*'''Day:''' The fish will only spawn between the hours of '''06:00 – 18:00''', based on in-game time.
*'''&mdash;:''' The fish will spawn at any hour.
